WA_SESSIONID.description: Puppeteer Session. Get it by running genToken.js

WEBHOOK_URL.description: Puppeteer Session. Get it by running genToken.js

HOST.description: Enable Pmpermit write true or false only

PORT.description: Enable Pmpermit write true or false only

HOST_URL.description: MongoDB URL, Get it for free from cloud.mongodb.com

API_KEY.description: How many seconds an user get muted if he is spamming. Default is 30 Minutes (1800 Secs)

AUTH_DOMAIN.description: Youtube DATA API key, grab it from cloud.google.com

PROJECT_ID.description: If true & if someone delete message in PM, Bot will send the deleted message in that chat (Exclude Media)
